text: @bennyjohnson @WHO @DrTedros Fact: On Jan 20, Prof.Zhong Nanshan, Head of China covid19 investigation team, publicly confirmed that coronavirus spread from human to human on national TV. It went Charlie D’amelio level viral the same day on China TikTok with 1.2m❤️Did German Intelligence lie without watch TV?
